DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluate kidney graft function maintenance renal transplant patient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability Full Dose Enteric-coated Mycophenolate Sodium , Addition Cyclosporine Microemulsion Reduced Dose , Maintenance Renal Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Male female recipient single double renal transplant perform since least one year 5 year Age > 18 yrs Adequate stable renal function Informed consent . Exclusion criterion : Kidney transplant combine organ ; Significant proteinuria Severe ongoing infection ; Present historical malignant neoplasia , type , exception excise non metastatic nonmelanoma skin cancer previous malignant neoplasia cure since least 5 year ; Relapse endstage renal disease transplant kidney ; Leucopenia , thrombocytopenia severe anemia ; Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
